row.process:
! :PRINT &VCENTER_LIEN# :PRINT &VCENTER_COMPTE# :print &VCENTER_MDP# :PRINT &VCENTER_LOCALISATION# :PRINT &VCENTER_VLAN# :PRINT &TEMPLATE_NAME#
:SET &MY_RC#="OK" :BEGIN_EXT_INT POWERSHELL $rc="OK" write-host "* * * * * * * * * *" get-executionpolicy write-host "* * * * * * * * * *" write-host "Connect-VIServer -Server &VCENTER_LIEN# -Protocol http -User '&VCENTER_COMPTE#' -Password '&VCENTER_MDP#'" write-host "* * * * * * * * * *" write-host "Get-Template -Name &TEMPLATE_NAME# -Location &VCENTER_LOCALISATION#" $template = Get-Template -Name &TEMPLATE_NAME# -Location &VCENTER_LOCALISATION# | where { validateFolderPath '&VCENTER_LOCALISATION#' $_.FolderId } if($template.count -ne 1) { Write-Host "Erreur nombre de template: $($template.count)" $rc="KO" } :REGISTER_VARIABLE "MY_RC#",$rc write-host "* * * * * * * * * *" :END_EXT_INT POWERSHELL

row.post_process: :IF &MY_RC# = "KO" : PRINT KO: TEMPLATE INEXISTANT &TEMPLATE_NAME# : PRINT DEBUG &EXIT_KISS_KO# : PSET &EXIT_KISS_KO#="&EXIT_KISS_KO#,TEMPLATE INEXISTANT &TEMPLATE_NAME#" : MODIFY_STATE STATUS_TEXT = "TEMPLATE INEXISTANT &TEMPLATE_NAME#" : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE = 10 :ELSE : PRINT OK: TEMPLATE EXISTE &TEMPLATE_NAME# : PSET &EXIT_KISS_OK#="&EXIT_KISS_OK#,TEMPLATE EXISTE &TEMPLATE_NAME#" :ENDIF
